title: Y3shot
author: Y3shot
content: What make people so much believe that immediately they just buy bitcoin they will become rich, like I was  just thinking about this, if people think the bitcoin you buy will bring more bitcoin just like that.if bitcoin should be something that only brings profits I doubt if it will be still existing today. It would have ended just like other ponzi schemes that placed over the years.  The way some people think about bitcoin they feel too comfortable and so relax as if life is so easy like money can be achieved with no form of work. Investors gain profits from Bitcoin because they worked for it, they had patience with the up and down of the market,  This is not an easy work that anybody with no understanding can achieve from bitcoin.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: Of a truth Bitcoin can make a person rich, their thoughts are actually correct. Where be say dem dey make the mistake na when they come feel say Bitcoin na just to carry money invest inside then in a month interval dey go fit cash am out like say na quick rich scheme be this. Another na the high expectations wey dey carry use invest dat money, immediately dey purchase the Bitcoin dey don already dey calculate their profits from dey head say in so time dey go done make this kind amount of money from the investment meanwhile no be so dey don forget the market dey rigid and volatile as u no go fit predict accurately all na just base on assumption and Bitcoin no dey follow such trend, e dey go up and down. Where be say Bitcoin just drop na so dem go begin panic dey plan to sell na why e good to understand Bitcoin as u dey plan invest inside.

comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on December 10, 2023, 07:11:17 AMWhat make people so much believe that immediately they just buy bitcoin they will become rich, like I was  just thinking about this, if people think the bitcoin you buy will bring more bitcoin just like that.if bitcoin should be something that only brings profits I doubt if it will be still existing today. Investors gain profits from Bitcoin because they worked for it, they had patience with the up and down of the market,  This is not an easy work that anybody with no understanding can achieve from bitcoin. Well you are right because no investor wants to lose though they do lose at times but in anything one is doing in life you need to be positive regardless of obstacles that might come along the line you need to remain focused and determined before you can attain great results. One of the things that's taking some persons that would have made a headway is impatient, like you can't be able to take your eyes off your investment for a long time before you start reaping the dividends that comes along with it.Bitcoin investment requires a long interval of time before you can see the proceeds of your investment so I see nothing bad if someone buys Bitcoin and feel so relaxed about it. Okay let's take for instance someone who bought Bitcoin when the price was still $27,000 and is watching his investment growing gradually now ain't you gonna be happy and excited?Our major challenge in this life is fear, like you begin to feel that what if you invest and lose at the end so the fear of failure has been taking so many persons backward. The only advice that should be given to an investor is not to invest all his income because if things doesn't really go the way they expected they might run into emotional trauma.Bitcoin investment is far from being a ponzi scheme because when you invest in Bitcoin you will see how the market is going and know when you're making profits or incurring losses unlike ponzi schemes that is very fraudulent because what they basically do in a ponzi scheme is just to rotate people's investment and after which they've witnessed a large number of investors the system eventually crashes.

Based on how bitcoin technology was built, it will not have a taste of being a Ponzi scheme or something similar to it. Most people that see it as a get rich quick scheme are not enlightened well about it and they just get some bitcoin and have it in mind that they are already rich. Time tells when they don’t get what they want and they exit the market with regrets and hatred for bitcoin since they didn’t get what they expected in the end. QuoteThe way some people think about bitcoin they feel too comfortable and so relax as if life is so easy like money can be achieved with no form of work. Investors gain profits from Bitcoin because they worked for it, they had patience with the up and down of the market,  This is not an easy work that anybody with no understanding can achieve from bitcoin. When it comes too easy then it isn’t worth it to make you rich for a long time to come. A lot of successful people pass through a lot of hardwork and patience before they reached where they are today. Nothing is free and no one guarantees you that you’ll become rich overnight no matter how simple it looks. Becoming rich in bitcoin requires patience and hardwork, it is better for you to have that mindset so that you don’t end up being disappointed when you don’t achieve what you wanted.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Na why em be sae any newbie wey you wan introduce for bitcoin investment or the one wey don invest on am already, you need to tell them the risk wey d involve and how volatile the market dey so that them no go carry hope put for bitcoin to make them rich in a short time. I think the cause of everything na because newbies are not informed about how bitcoin  investment d properly. Na why em be sae them they carry a wrong belief about bitcoin investment to make them rich quick.To minimize this wrong beliefs wey newbies get for bitcoin, em go d good if we can take as a duty to the lecture newbie about what and what they shouldn't expect from their bitcoin investment. By doing that alone, I think it will go a long way for them to be less bothered when bitcoin price is declining in price or not going by their plans to make them rich in short time.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Beginners have seen so many people who have invested in Bitcoin becoming rich and they have also seen testimonies on social media platforms where people quit their jobs because of the profit they made from their Bitcoin investment. Bitcoin can make anyone rich if you understand that it is not a get-rich-quick scheme, and requires patience for profit to follow in. QuoteThe way some people think about bitcoin they feel too comfortable and so relax as if life is so easy like money can be achieved with no form of workOp, after investing in Bitcoin you don't need any work to be done on your Bitcoin investment. What you just need to do is to hold your Bitcoin for a long term like 4-10 years depending on your plan in your Bitcoin investment. What you need most is to have a source of income that will solve your financial challenges so that you will not have to depend on selling your Bitcoin even when you are at a loss to solve your problems.

comments.body: @Y3shotWhat I see about people around me is that they think they can invest in bitcoin to either make profit from it or lose. Because of the loss, some people do not want to invest at all but later not happy if the price of bitcoin has gone up.Beginners believe bitcoin can make them reach because the price has always been going up in long term. As the marketcap is increasing, the price may not increase as it was before, but the price is still going higher in long term. It is not a wrong believe if they can research and learn when to invest and when not to invest.If someone still invest in bitcoin in time like this, it is good because next year is halving and we are expected all-time-high.

comments.body: They are not wrong with their thinking. There is a saying they seeing is believing. I have seen Bitcoin transformed the financial life of people who invested in it and had patience. comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: If you are Bitcoin whale, Bitcoin can make you rich. The obvious truth is that the more Bitcoin you get the richer you become. Getting rich through Bitcoin is not an overnight achievement. Newbies who invest in Bitcoin have a skill that is worthy of multiplying your bitcoins like - bitcoin trading, Bitcoin lending, gambling with Bitcoin, and others. I highly recommend that you already have some level of expertise in these areas before you make think about going into it.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Many people think that Bitcoin is to get quick rich investment scheme whereby they can just invest and make money within few weeks and when they start and didn't make it at that their predicted time they would be tired and some would even gave up the journey and sell off all and used the money. People think differently about Bitcoin investment. Some set the goal for one year and Bitcoin investment go reach 5-7 years before you can be proud of it and e good make you start am when the market e dey low well well. And anyone wey dey invest for short term and planning to make money at that time then him no plan well. And if care no dey him go loss well well. Him go get disappointment. So make anyone wey dey invest in Bitcoin just plan to invest for long term and remove that mindset say Bitcoin go make rich quick. And many people sef dey think like that because of the people wey done make for their life through Bitcoin but dem no know say those people wey don make, e don tay for di industry. And dem don spend years for the investment. So if dem dey make am you no supposed surprised and imitate dem. You have to be patient and invest.

No be totally gambling sha o but for me, some part of gamble dey inside Bitcoin trading.E dey hard to understand Bitcoin trading but I assure you say there is nothing hard to accumulate Bitcoin and hold, the only thing way I see way dey hard be say, nah just for you to try reduce your expenses and accumulate Bitcoin with the kind of money way no go affect you if you use am take invest inside Bitcoin.So, I dey try to talk say Bitcoin fit make you reach but nah with luck and good strategies, like if you have the mindset of holding for long, like 5 to 10 years then you are profit free.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: OP, you have the privilege to learn about Bitcoin from the right source, and that's why you are able to think differently from those who actually think that Bitcoin can just make them rich. Someone said that Bitcoin is not a get-rich-quick scheme or a get-poor scheme. If an individual actually has or learns about Bitcoin from the right source, they will never have the idea that Bitcoin will make them rich.In fact, investment in Bitcoin can only generate profit depending on the amount invested. For example, if someone invests $2000 in Bitcoin and another person invests $30k in Bitcoin, their level of profit will be greatly different, and the person who only invested $2k should not expect to make more profit than the person who invested $30k.In essence, what I'm saying is that not everyone who invests in Bitcoin will be able to generate a very significant profit. The higher your investment, the higher your profit.
